PageTitle: info-center loghost source(Virtual access port-extension view)
FuncDef:
The info-center loghost source command configures the source interface through which APs send information to a syslog server.
The undo info-center loghost source command cancels the configuration of the source interface through which APs send information to a syslog server.
By default, the source interface is the interface that sends information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface. Only the loopback interface type is supported.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a virtual access port extension scenario, you can run the info-center loghost source command to configure a source interface for each AP, so that the syslog server can obtain the source interface address of received information and determine which AP sends the information based on the source interface address. This helps the syslog server properly retrieve the received information.
Prerequisites
An IP address has been assigned to the source interface to be set.
